main event: Two UFO sightings were reported in Savannah, Georgia on May 6, 1964, one shaped like a blimp gondola and the other like a diamond.
interesting points: First sighting described as silver dollar shape with 4-5 windows and landing lights,No sound was reported during the sightings, The first object flew overhead and disappeared at 45 degrees elevation, The second sighting involved a large bright center light with four smaller lights in a diamond formation, Witnesses appeared reliable and local authorities reported no unusual activity.
sighted object: UFOs shaped like a blimp gondola and a diamond
witness description: Civilian witnesses included a housewife, an insurance salesman, and a policeman, among others.
